subject: This is to inform you that i
body:

Good bye

subject: Re:  This is to inform you that i
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I'm sorry to hear that my payment has been cancelled. Could you please provide more information on why this happened and what steps I need to take to rectify the situation?

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Douglas
